ComicInfo.Series: Evil Ernie: Youth Gone Wild - Encore Presentation
ComicInfo.Title: Murder Mardi Gras in Suburbia
ComicInfo.Summary: Murder Mardi Gras in Suburbia: Ernest Fairchild has returned from the dead as Evil Ernie and immediately begins killing everyone around him and resurrecting them as his Dead Onez. Mary and Price give chase and, unfortunately for them, actually manage to catch up with Ernie and his horde of ghouls.
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-16 19:17:57. [Issue ID 382989]
